summary: In 1941, the inhabitants of a small Jewish village in Central Europe organize a fake deportation train so that they can escape the Nazis and flee to Palestine.
cast: Lionel Abelanski|Rufus|Clément Harari|Michel Muller|Agathe de La Fontaine|Johan Leysen|Bruno Abraham-Kremer|Marie-José Nat|Gad Elmaleh|Serge Kribus|Michel Israël|Rodica Sanda Tutuianu|Sanda Toma|Zwi Kanar|Razvan Vasilescu|Mihai Calin|Ovidiu Cuncea|Marius Drogeanu|Vladimir Jurascu|Robert Borremans|Bebe Bercovici|Luminita Gheorghiu|Georges Siatidis|Michel Vanderlinden|Daniel Decot|Constantin Barbulescu|Constantin Codrescu|Theodor Danetti|Savel Stiopul|Constantin Dinulescu|Marian Stan|Mugur Arvunescu|Cornel Vulpe|George Ulmeni|Eugenia Serban|Florin Kevorkian|Ernest Maftei|Serban Danescu|Mihacia Bercu|Rudy Rosenfeld|Cristian Irimia|Mircea Cojan|Alexandru Georgescu|Corneliu Revent|Cornel Ciupercescu|Mircea Constantinescu|Constantin Draganescu|Silvia Nastase|Domalta Constantinlu|Laura Neagle|Marioara Sterian|Rosana Gutman|Corneliu Jipa|Claudiu Istodor|Petre Lupu|Aristita Diamandi|Cristina Barsan|Cornel Streche|Olga Bucataru|Leonie Waldman Eliad|Eugenia Bosânceanu|Tudorel Filimon|Constantin Ghenescu
title: El tren de la vida
